con:call.name: SetAutoBuy Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2020/21/swsim/SwsimV106">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:SetAutoBuy>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <sws:AutoBuySettings>\r <sws:AutoBuyEnabled>?</sws:AutoBuyEnabled>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PurchaseAmount>0.0</sws:PurchaseAmount>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:TriggerAmount>0.0</sws:TriggerAmount>\r </sws:AutoBuySettings>\r </sws:SetAutoBuy>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
